theme: International Residual Mechanism for Criminal Tribunals
entities: International Residual Mechanism for Criminal Tribunals
International Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia
summary:
The Security Council, recalling its previous resolutions 1966 (2010) and 2256 (2015), and its decision in resolution 2038 (2012) appointing the Prosecutor of the International Residual Mechanism for Criminal Tribunals (the Mechanism), 

Decides to appoint Mr. Serge Brammertz as Prosecutor of the Mechanism with effect from 1 March 2016 until 30 June 2018, and thereafter the Prosecutor may be appointed or reappointed for a two-year term. 

Decides that judges and Registrar of the Mechanism may be appointed or reappointed for a two-year term, notwithstanding the Statute of the Mechanism. 

Decides to remain seized of the matter.
